original_title: The Great Myanmar - ကြီးမြတ်သောမြန်မာ
overview: The film follows a young boy from Inlay Lake on his quest for knowledge of Myanmar traditions, culture and Buddhism with his grandfather telling him tale of the legends and myths from the past. Through this, we explore Myanmar’s National Treasures and uncover their ancient mysteries. We then revisited the ancient empire of Bagan. The establishment of the first Myanmar empire and how it has reinvigorated Buddhism throughout the region.
title: The Great Myanmar - ကြီးမြတ်သောမြန်မာ
